movie.title: Capote
movie.plot: A biopic of the writer, Truman Capote and his assignment for The New Yorker to write the non-fiction book, 'In Cold Blood'.

events.title: the Herbert Clutter family are murdered
Truman Capote reads an article about the murders of the Herbert Clutter family
Richard Hickock and Perry Smith are arrested
Truman Capote attends the executions of Richard Hickock and Perry Smith
